entries.meaning: A person or thing that sustains.
examples: […]  But thy selfe, hast a sustainer bene
Of much affliction in my cause:  […]

entries.meaning: (aeronautics) A rocket engine that remains with a spacecraft during its ascent after the separation of the booster engines.
(US) A person who makes regular donations, especially to a public radio or television station.
(US, obsolete) A radio program without a commercial sponsor.
examples: 21st time this year a sponsor gave the nod to a sustainer: from now on Let’s Pretend, a CBS sustainer for 13 years, will pretend for Cream of Wheat.
